about: Greetings, I'm Rethabile Makaotsi, a dynamic Full-stack Development enthusiast currently honing my skills at Life Choices. My passion lies in the art of transforming visionary ideas into robust, functional code. I thrive on the inherent challenges that coding presents, viewing each obstacle as an opportunity for growth.

Fueling my journey is an unwavering commitment to continuous learning and a fervent desire to make meaningful contributions to impactful projects within the tech industry. As you navigate through my portfolio, you'll witness not only my technical proficiency but also a dedication to delivering high-quality solutions in both front-end and back-end development.

I extend my gratitude for taking the time to explore my portfolio. Whether you're here to connect, collaborate, or simply share ideas, feel free to reach out. I'm always eager to engage in exciting projects and discussions. Let's embark on this journey together, where innovation meets functionality.

education.place: Chris Hani Art And Culture High school

education.description: I got my certificates on computer literature

testimonials.name: Rachel
testimonials.quotes: Joel never ceases to amaze me with the vast amount of knowledge he has acquired over the years in software development. He is truly a great mentor.

testimonials.name: Ruth
testimonials.quotes: Joel is a nice person. Someone who is really reliable and honest always does his work and makes sure everything is well organized.

testimonials.name: Lazola
testimonials.quotes: Joel Tshimanga Mukunya is an incredibly humble intellectual. He is an outstanding lecturer who consistently finds effective ways to ensure that everyone comprehends the content. Additionally, he has a delightful personality, making him a joy to be around.

testimonials.name: Dr. Godwin P
testimonials.quotes: I am thrilled to share my heartfelt testimonial for Joel, a remarkable former co-worker and lecturer. Joel worked under my guidance for one year during my time as Head of Curriculum and Learning at Lifechoices Academy. His expertise in C++, HTML, CSS, Vue.js, JavaScript, and Node.js is truly impressive, and he effortlessly demonstrates proficiency in these technologies. However, what truly sets Joel apart is his exceptional teaching skills. He has a natural talent for breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible bits, making the learning process enjoyable and engaging. Joel's patience and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure every student grasps the material are truly commendable. I consider myself fortunate to have learned from him, and I wholeheartedly recommend him as an outstanding educator.

projects.name: To-do List
projects.description: I built this application using HTML 5, CSS, and Javascript.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: Message believers Circle
projects.description: MBC is an application I built for my client for selling products online. I make use of Vue3 JS, MySQL, APIs, and JSON Web Tokens.

projects.name: JT Laptop
projects.description: An eCommerce site built using HTML 5, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap 5

projects.name: JS Portfolio
projects.description: I built my portfolio using HTML 5, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. I am using JS to display my dynamic content.
